_comment: Opens the directory of the settings.json at the start of the App

submessage.channel: here you can write your message. Use %username% for the subscribers username
submessage.default: the default message is the message that will be used if no message for the channel is defined and if channel message and default message is undefined there will be no message output

resubmessage.channel: here you can write your message. Use %username% for the subscribers username and %months% for the resub length
resubmessage.default: the default message is the message that will be used if no message for the channel is defined and if channel message and default message is undefined there will be no message output

submysterygiftmessage.channel: here you can write your message. Use %username% for the gifters username and %subs% for the number of subs gifted
submysterygiftmessage.default: the default message is the message that will be used if no message for the channel is defined and if channel message and default message is undefined there will be no message output

subgiftmessage.channel: here you can write your message. Use %username% for the gifters username and %recipient% for the recipients username
subgiftmessage.default: the default message is the message that will be used if no message for the channel is defined and if channel message and default message is undefined there will be no message output

_comment.channels: The Channels that will be joined (all prefixed with a sharp(#))
_comment.channelSubMessages: The Channels where the sub messages will be written out

submessage.syrinxx1337: syrinxxSub syrinxxSub syrinxxSub %username% syrinxxSub syrinxxSub syrinxxSub
submessage.default: syrinxxSub syrinxxSub syrinxxSub %username% syrinxxSub syrinxxSub syrinxxSub

resubmessage.syrinxx1337: syrinxxSub syrinxxSub syrinxxSub %username% x%months% syrinxxSub syrinxxSub syrinxxSub
resubmessage.default: syrinxxSub syrinxxSub syrinxxSub %username% x%months% syrinxxSub syrinxxSub syrinxxSub

submysterygiftmessage.syrinxx1337: syrinxxGift syrinxxGift syrinxxGift %username% gifted %subs% sub/s to the Community syrinxxGift syrinxxGift syrinxxGift
submysterygiftmessage.default: syrinxxGift syrinxxGift syrinxxGift %username% gifted %subs% sub/s to the Community syrinxxGift syrinxxGift syrinxxGift

subgiftmessage.syrinxx1337: syrinxxGift syrinxxGift syrinxxGift %username% to %recipient% syrinxxGift syrinxxGift syrinxxGift
subgiftmessage.default: syrinxxGift syrinxxGift syrinxxGift %username% to %recipient% syrinxxGift syrinxxGift syrinxxGift
